caption: Not only was the fountain cool. The whole park was. Lots of history and still is kept up to date. Awesome experience

Beautiful! Please actually go all the way along it to the statue as they are beautiful to see up close. Too many people took a photo than ran away instead of appreciating the place. It‚Äôs a stunning art work and worthy of your time to appreciate. There are lots of chairs around so you can relax here too.
Such a beautiful park. Ideal for relaxation. We visited the park in the early morning hours. All recommendations for a visit

Beautiful spot. Ended up going 3 different times for the 10 days we were in Paris. Once just us. Then with two different groups of friends. It feels peaceful despite being in busy surroundings . A cafe next to it and further down towards garden,there is a coffee cart with cool drinks and freshly made juice too.
Beautiful fountain!  The park is so big & beautiful‚Ä¶..  I almost missed seeing it.

One of the highlights of the park is this fountain. There is seating along each side and when the sun is out it's beautiful. Some ducks in the water. It's picture perfect. You will also see many people getting a picture here with the fountain in the background.
Beautiful palace. I know the Medici fountain is especially beautiful during Fall, but we got there in January, and it is still gorgeous.

This is a very elegant fountain that has an incredible story behind it and was made for the Medici royal family, here enjoy the photos, the entrance to the park to visit the fountain is absolutely free and open to the public.
Great free fountain tou can visit. The entire park is amazing. A tip: I struggled to find the entrance to the park. The nearest entrance is opposite the Odeon theatre de l‚Äôeurope
Superb spot to click pictures, sit & read a book or just to admire nature. Super pretty while sun set
The whole garden is really nice to walk in and the fountain is beautiful
Beautiful fountain! I believe that it's been recently renovated. It's gets quite busy during summer, but usually you can find a chair to read a book
A beautiful and peaceful place to take a break from the busy city

Medici fountain is a nice spot in the Gardens of Luxembourg. If you are going to the Pantheon, this is just a block away. Nice for a quick look. The surrounding park has beautiful flowers in the spring and relaxing chairs to sit and enjoy the park in the middle of the busy Paris.
Surprising fountain at Luxembourg Gardens elegantly fitting I. Natural surroundings.  Beautiful place to hang out and relax with friends and take it all in.

Such a gorgeous fountain! The setting all around is so beautiful even in winter. Get up close to the fountain to really admire it and check out the backside even if it isn‚Äôt quite as impressive‚Ä¶ still worth seeing the entire fountain! üß° ‚Ä¶

A lovely place to relax even on a busy day. There are chairs all around the fountain where you can take a load off. We sat there for about 45 min to rest our feet on a heavy walking day during our Paris vacay.
A magnificent fountain and a very pleasant place to rest.

A wonderful spot to take a break, have a picnic and soak in the sun for a moment. The park is free and allows you to bring in food and wine. Something to note is the park does close. I think the hours are very close to the Luxembourg palace. Also, there is a little Cafe near the fountain.

A serene place at the edge of Jardin du Luxembourg with lovely sculpture and a long reflective pool. The fountain is lovely to photograph near sunset. Take a moment also to look at the bas-relief & information on the rear of the fountain wall. Well worth a visit.
Beautiful fountain inside the Luxembourg Palace gardens with history dating back to 1630 and Maria de Medici, widow of Henry lV and mother of Louis Xlll.
Love this place, very tranquille and poetic
Beautifull place fir reading or meditation
Great place to relax for a while and gather your thoughts. Nice touch that they have seats and tables around the pond area .

Just a walk away from the pantheon and notre dam cathedral is the Medici fountain and man it is something to experience and enjoy when visiting the gardens in Paris. Although it can get busy, this is a must see and do activity and I thoroughly enjoyed visiting the fountain.
If you are going to the Pantheon, this is just a block away. Nice for a quick look. Tha adjacent park has beautiful flowers in the spring.
Charming spot to relax with a spot of lunch from a nearby deli
A perfect place to visit!!! I have enjoyed the beauty in the serenity of the place!!! The Medici fountain makes you feel the journey in the past under the shade of trees!!!

Beautiful Italian style statues with a fountain which resembles a mirror.  There are chairs to sit around it. It is worth visiting and enjoying it. If you visit the Luxembourg gardens, don't forget to visit the Medicis fountain.
Heaven on earth. So much beauty in nature and art. It is a very relaxing place. One of my favorites.
Wow, this fountain was very beautiful. No matter how much I took pictures of it, I couldn't get enough of it. If you go to Luxembourg Park, you must see it and take a picture with it.
Such a peaceful, beautiful spot to relax, read, enjoy life ...
Such a serene place to sit and relax or read

A truly gorgeous fountain that has undergone a massive recent restoration. It‚Äôs really worth checking it out. Quite a romantic little spot. It usually has a lot of people hanging around and taking pictures.
Absolutely stunning park in the heart of Paris, the little boats were great fun for the whole family!
Gorgeous fountain, loved visiting this park in general.
Great place to relax, read and / or bring snacks/food and chill....love the ducks.
Beautiful fountain, the water needs to be cleaned!
